skilllist.skilldesc:
When units die near Hanzo, the demon Hanekage absorbs their souls and converts them into <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font>.
Hanzo gains 5 <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font> for each non-hero unit and  <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font> for each hero that dies in his vicinity.

Every 20% basic attacks by Hanzo <font color="a6aafb">temporarily unlocks</font> this ability for 600<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font>s.
Hanzo uses Ame no Habakiri to devour a target and digest them over a period of time. By doing so Hanzo gets 10% <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font>. (Can only be used against Minions and Creeps. Targeting Lord or Turtle deals 50% <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>).

Hanzo summons demonic spikes at the target location, dealing 0.5 immediate <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.
If an enemy is hit, the skill will strike again after 90<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Extra Physical Attack)</font>s, dealing 5 <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to targets in the area and slowing them by 40% until no target is hit or dealing additional damage for 20% times.
Every unit hit grants him  <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font>.

Hanzo gains 17 Demon Blood and sends out the demon <font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> in the target direction while gaining a new set of skills.

<font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> consumes 2 <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font> every second while he is out. Hanzo's body will be slowly pulled to Hanekage's location as Demon Blood depletes. <font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> can move through terrain and gains 20 Movement Speed and 50% Attack Speed, but his Physical & Magic Defense are reduced by 30%.

If <font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> is killed, he will be drawn back to Hanzo's body, stunning Hanzo for 16%s and weakening him for 50%s (slowing him by 6, reducing his Physical & Magic Defense by , and revealing his location to enemies). If <font color="a6aafb">Hanzo's body</font> is killed, he will die immediately and Hanekage will disappear.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Hanekage returns to Hanzo's body (the additional skill button will summon Hanzo's body to Hanekage instead).

When units die near Hanzo, the demon Hanekage absorbs their souls and converts them into <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font>.
Hanzo gains 5 <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font> for each non-hero unit and  <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font> for each hero that dies in his vicinity.

Every 20% basic attacks by Hanzo temporarily <font color="a6aafb">unlocks this skill</font> for 600<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font>s.
Hanzo burrows underground and lunges forward to attack enemies in a line, dealing 10% and 50% of the target's max HP as <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, knocking them airborne and gaining 120% <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font>. (Damage reduced against non-hero units)

Hanzo gains 17 Demon Blood and sends out the demon <font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> in the target direction while gaining a new set of skills.

<font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> consumes 2 <font color="a6aafb">Demon Blood</font> every second while he is out. Hanzo's body will be slowly pulled to Hanekage's location as Demon Blood depletes. <font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> can move through terrain and gains 20 Movement Speed and 50% Attack Speed, but his Physical & Magic Defense are reduced by 30%.

If <font color="a6aafb">Hanekage</font> is killed, he will be drawn back to Hanzo's body, stunning Hanzo for 16%s and weakening him for 50%s (slowing him by 6, reducing his Physical & Magic Defense by , and revealing his location to enemies). If <font color="a6aafb">Hanzo's body</font> is killed, he will die immediately and Hanekage will disappear.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Hanekage returns to Hanzo's body (the additional skill button will summon Hanzo's body to Hanekage instead).

data.name: Hanzo

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Harass with Basic Attacks, then secure the kill with maxed-stack Skill 1.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After every <Num1> separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by <%Num2> for <Num3>s.########[8098ab]A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
equiplist.equipskill2: Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equiptips:
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 8 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 8 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: 疑犯_Yifan
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Genius ninja in the Shadow Sect who is at the crossroads.

assist.desc: Hanzo has high burst potential but needs time to stack his Passive, so he works best with heroes who can keep the enemy CC'd, like Aurora, Belerick, and Tigreal.

strong.desc: Hanzo's Ultimate enables him to poke or dive with relative safety, making him a serious threat to squishy heroes without mobility, like Layla, Ixia, and Zhuxin, while also disrupting the enemy in teamfights.

weak.desc: Hanzo fares less favorably against heroes with lots of mobility, such as Fanny, Lancelot, and Arlott, since it's difficult to build stacks on them, thus limiting Hanzo's damage.
